name: Pyramid 2097
description:
Pyramid 2097 is an asteroids-style shooter with a fine-tuned movement model. 

Join the mysterious group known as Pyramid. Weaponize the digital landscape and blast through waves of enemies. The future is bright and full of explosions.

Current Status: Early Access 
3 Arenas (+Tutorial) 
6 Upgrade options 
6 In-game pickups 
5 Enemies

Goal: Full Release 1
~6 Arenas (+Tutorial/Test Zone)
~10 Upgrade options
~10 In-game pickups
~10 Enemies
(new designs are to be playtested so numbers are not final)

All future updates/releases will be free for those who purchase the game in Early Access.

Join the Discord to give feedback and influence its development.

Music and SFX by Tom Wanless.
